message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 6000:4000.

I've decided to be more equitable. Let's split the money evenly.
You're getting desperate. I'll take 9k and leave you with a small consolation prize. Don't expect any mercy.

Considering the diminishing value of our currency, I propose a 4200:5800 split. Let's see if this is acceptable.
